trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<system.identityModel.services>" name="<system.identityModel.services>" href=""></xref> section in a configuration file.
The `<system.identityModel.services>` section configures authentication using WS-Federation protocol.
It contains elements that configure the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule> (WSFAM) and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> (SAM).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.SystemIdentityModelServicesSection"></xref> class.
Gets a reference to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<system.identityModel.services>" name="<system.identityModel.services>" href=""></xref> section from the configuration file.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_<system.identityModel.services>" name="<system.identityModel.services>" href=""></xref> section from the configuration file.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the configuration file does not contain a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<system.identityModel.services>" name="<system.identityModel.services>" href=""></xref> section.
Gets the unnamed <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""></xref> element from the configuration file.

The unnamed `<federationConfiguration>` element does not have its `name` attribute set (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationElement.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `null`).
The unnamed <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""></xref> element from the configuration file.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the configuration file does not contain a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<system.identityModel.services>" name="<system.identityModel.services>" href=""></xref> section.

Gets the collection of <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""></xref> elements configured in this <xref uid="langword_csharp_<system.identityModel.services>" name="<system.identityModel.services>" href=""></xref> section.

A collection that contains all of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""></xref> elements configured in this <xref uid="langword_csharp_<system.identityModel.services>" name="<system.identityModel.services>" href=""></xref> section.
A constant that defines the name of the configuration section; “system.identityModel.services”.
